formcompletions-desc: Provide an extensible AutoCompletion API to MediaWiki.
formcompletions-api-substr-param: The substring to use to match against.
formcompletions-api-finder-param: The finder you want to use against.
apierror-formcompletions-invalid-finder: The completion system you specified ($1) does not exist on this wiki.
apierror-formcompletions-closure-not-val: A closure cannot be used as a completer
apierror-formcompletions-method-not-exis: Class ($1) does not have the '$2' method
